attributes.action: Stop Illegal Towing at London Luton Airport
attributes.additional_details: Discuss putting an end to the illegal towing and clamping operation that London Luton Airport (and others) are running as a punitive money-making scheme against motorists parked for just a few minutes in some cases to drop passengers off.  Done under the guise of security and/or traffic control, this activity has been made illegal under the Protection of Freedoms Act 2012 yet the police are failing in their powers to act in the public interest on the matter.
